title: UnAlive
description: Adam's world is winding down. A mysterious event takes place which speeds up the rate of decay. Global disasters accelerate, followed by other - more bizarre - manifestations. A bloodthirsty cult arises believing they have found the one thing to stave off the death process. Now, Adam must decide whether to embrace a strange priest's impossible suggestion and lead a small group of survivors across an apocalyptic landscape where all their hopes may lie in one, very unlikely cure.
author: Kevin J. Fitzgerald
